name: Colour Bounce (TiredAndConfused)
description:
A simple Physics Based Puzzle game, slightly inspired by Chips Challenge, with a focus on Colours.

The aim is, get the Ball to the Goal. There are 10 Levels for you to play through, hope you enjoy it!

Left Click behind the Ball to propel it

Right Click it to change the Colour

Esc to bring up the Pause Menu

BUGS:

  • The Ball can sometimes get stuck and can't be launched. 
    • TEMP FIX - Press escape and restart level.
  • The final screen is missing which lists all of the Time you got in game and allows you to Restart or Exit:
    • FIX TO BE ADDED ONCE CLOUD JAM HAS FINISHED
